verbs.description: [ARG0: Daniels] [V: wants] [ARG1: to restart a defamation lawsuit against President Donald Trump and his lawyer Michael Cohen , which recently was put on ice because of a pending federal criminal probe of Cohen] .

[ARG0: Daniels] wants to [V: restart] [ARG1: a defamation lawsuit against President Donald Trump and his lawyer Michael Cohen , which recently was put on ice because of a pending federal criminal probe of Cohen] .
Daniels wants to restart a defamation lawsuit against President Donald Trump and his lawyer Michael Cohen , which recently [V: was] put on ice because of a pending federal criminal probe of Cohen .

Daniels wants to restart [ARG1: a defamation lawsuit against President Donald Trump and his lawyer Michael Cohen] , [R-ARG1: which] [ARGM-TMP: recently] was [V: put] [ARG2: on ice] [ARGM-CAU: because of a pending federal criminal probe of Cohen] .

Daniels wants to restart a defamation lawsuit against President Donald Trump and his lawyer Michael Cohen , which recently was put on ice because of a [V: pending] [ARG1: federal criminal probe] of Cohen .
